name: nova-prettier-extension
author: Toni Förster
description: Prettier integration for Nova – format JavaScript, TypeScript, JSON, CSS, HTML, Markdown, and more, with built-in support for Java, PHP, SQL, and XML – no extra setup required.

scripts.clean: rm -f prettier.novaextension/config.json prettier.novaextension/configWorkspace.json && rm -rf prettier.novaextension/de.lproj prettier.novaextension/en.lproj prettier.novaextension/node_modules prettier.novaextension/Scripts
